summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North Fifty-eighth Street from Phinney Avenue to First Avenue Northwest; First Avenue Northwest from North Fifty-eighth Street to West Fifty-eighth Street; and West Fifty-eighth Street from First Avenue Northwest to Second Avenue Northwest produced, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains therein, together with appurtenances, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 31616, of the records of the City Comptroller of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
